title: Task-Oriented Collaborative Learning for Surgical Site Infection Prevention

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operating room infection control procedures and relevant job experience
context.additional_context: An educational program for medical company practitioners to strengthen surgical infection prevention competencies through collaborative online learning.

learning_goals: Apply evidence-based protocols for surgical site infection prevention with 80%+ accuracy
Perform infection control collaboration scenarios through role-playing with multidisciplinary team members (nurses, doctors, technicians, etc.)
Develop infection prevention action plans based on peer feedback through LMS assignments and peer reviews
Identify three or more infection risk factors in operating room environments using video case studies and virtual simulations

resources: Operating Room Infection Control Video Resources

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
